Title: The Emerald Forest
Actors: Powers Boothe, Meg Foster, Yara Vaneau, William Rodriguez
Plot: Based on a true story, Powers Boothe plays an American dam engineer in Brazil. Boothe's son (played by Charlie Boorman - son of director John Boorman) is kidnapped by a rain forest tribe, and raised as one of their own. Boothe continues to look for him and after many trials and adventures, stumbles upon him.
Awards: Nominated for 3 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 2 nominations.
